content: A lot of the questions have been asked and answered, but just kind of circling back on the inflationary pressure as the pricing increases that you've been able to implement and you made some comments to an earlier question about pretty much everyone is in the kind of the same boat, most people are expecting this and everyone's kind of pushing these prices through, but I was wondering, if you could maybe share any sort of anecdotal information may be that you're receiving from your clients perhaps as to what, what sort of this impact of increasing prices is doing to retail demand and what sort of the expectations are there as we look forward the next few say six to 12 months?
